name: Dark Hopes
description:
Dark Hopes in an interactive narrative "soft-horror" game about hope and vengeance, created for Themed Horror Jam #9 Halloween Edition., developed by a small team of members of Brown Girl Gamer Code.

This was half of our team's first game jam, some of which had never been part of developing a game before, so we're excited to have developed as much as we did!

Content Warnings: Flashing/potential seizure warning, familial death, some scary theming

Development Team

  • Programming - Whitney E. White (Yin)  
  • Art - Ciniqo Art (Noiryt)
  • Narrative Design - Kieran Tobias (kjtiberius)
  • Web/HTML - Blazette Midnight (Blaze)
  • Art - GentleMoonBell (MellBerri)   
  • Art/UI - Mockstache
  • Production - Ave “Calamity” Kaye
